Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.writers

Interface Summary
DecorativeWriter A writer that decorates another writer.
Writer An output to write to.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDecorativeWriter Convenience superclass for decorative writers.
AbstractOutputStreamWriter Writes to an output stream.
AbstractWriter Convenience superclass for writers.
FileWriter Writes to a file.
ListWriter A writer that adds written objects to a list.
NullWriter Ignores all written objects.
OutputStreamWriter Writes to an existing output stream.
PreserveWhitespaceWriter Writes text to an underlying writer while preserving only a number of contiguous characters of a certain type.
StringWriter A writer that builds a string.
TextWriter A writer that wraps another writer and writes strings to it.
ToggleableWriter Writes objects to its underlying writer or ignores them, depending on its state.
TrimWriter Trims text as it is written.
 

Enum Summary
PreserveWhitespaceWriter.WhitespaceType A kind of whitespace.
TrimWriter.TrimType A way to trim text.
 

Exception Summary
WriterException Occurs when something goes wrong while using a writer.
